A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is a movie about moving on from mistakes and past failures. It's a movie that challeged how I view my heroes and who's really a good guy and who's really a good guy. The film was even better after the second viewing as I was able to let go of my preconceived notions of what I felt the movie should be. Rian Johnson made a great movie and Daisy\, Mark\, Carrie\, John\, and Oscar gave us a well acted movie.
